    • Method Detail

      • register

        public long register(java.lang.String serverHost,
            int serverPort)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Performs call to Proxy to register Server with the Proxy.
        Parameters:
        serverHost - Your own hostname (of Server) to let Proxy know where to contact you.
        serverPort - Your own port (of Server) to let Proxy know where to contact you.
        Returns:
        Return value from the Proxy.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • heartbeat

        public void heartbeat(long id,
             long serverTimestamp)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Performs call to Proxy to send heartbeat.
        Parameters:
        id - Some number. Do what you will with it. ;-)
        serverTimestamp - Timestamp on this Server (use System.currentTimeMillis()).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
